description: This file defines a Flutter widget screen called ResultsScreen, which displays the results of a menu generation process including a grid of result cards, a summary header, and action buttons for saving the run and initiating a new scan. It interacts with models such as MenuRun and MenuItem, and references other UI widgets like MenuResultCard.

classes.name: ResultsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays the results of a MenuRun, including a grid of image/error badges, run summary, and action buttons for saving and starting a new scan.

classes.name: _ResultsHeader
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that shows a summary header with counts of successes, errors, total items, and optional error summary.

classes.name: _ResultsGrid
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a responsive grid or list of MenuResultCard widgets based on the run items.

classes.name: _Pill
classes.description: A small UI widget used to display labeled colored badges with icons, representing statuses in the summary header.

methods.name: _saveRun
methods.description: Asynchronously simulates saving the MenuRun, updating UI state, and showing a confirmation SnackBar.

methods.name: _newScan
methods.description: Navigates back to the initial capture screen by popping routes until the first is reached.
